00041 /* The maximum possible ammount of concurrent ZDP requests. */
00042 #ifndef N_ZDP_REQUESTS_POOL_SIZE
00043   #define N_ZDP_REQUESTS_POOL_SIZE 3u
00044 #endif /* N_ZDP_REQUESTS_POOL_SIZE */
00045 
00048 typedef uint8_t N_Zdp_Status_t;
00049 
00050 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_SUCCESS                    0x00u
00051 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_INVALID_REQUEST_TYPE       0x80u
00052 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND           0x81u
00053 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_INVALID_ENDPOINT           0x82u
00054 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NOT_ACTIVE                 0x83u
00055 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED              0x84u
00056 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_TIMEOUT                    0x85u
00057 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NO_MATCH                   0x86u
00058 
00059 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NO_ENTRY                   0x88u
00060 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NO_DESCRIPTOR              0x89u
00061 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_INSUFFICIENT_SPACE         0x8Au
00062 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NOT_PERMITTED              0x8Bu
00063 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_TABLE_FULL                 0x8Cu
00064 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_NOT_AUTHORIZED             0x8Du
00065 
00066 // Mgmt_NWK_Update_req - scanDuration field special values
00067 #define N_ZDP_MGMT_NWK_UPDATE_CHANNEL_CHANGE    0xFEu
00068 #define N_ZDP_MGMT_NWK_UPDATE_MASK_MANAGER      0xFFu
00069 
00070 // Mgmt_Rtg_rsp status values
00071 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_RTG_ENTRY_ACTIVE                 0x00u
00072 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_RTG_ENTRY_DISCOVERY_UNDERWAY     0x01u
00073 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_RTG_ENTRY_DISCOVERY_FAILED       0x02u
00074 #define N_ZDP_STATUS_RTG_ENTRY_INACTIVE               0x03u
00075 
00076 // make sure that the payload structures are packed
00077 // ...assume that all compilers do support it
00078 #pragma pack(1)
00079 
00080 
00081 typedef struct N_Zdp_StatusRsp_t
00082 {
00083     uint8_t           sequenceNumber;
00084     N_Zdp_Status_t    status;
00085 } N_Zdp_StatusRsp_t;
00086 
00087 typedef struct N_Zdp_AddrRsp_t
00088 {
00089     uint8_t           sequenceNumber;
00090     N_Zdp_Status_t    status;
00091     N_Address_Extended_t ieeeAddrRemoteDevice;
00092     uint16_t          nwkAddrRemoteDevice;
00093 } N_Zdp_AddrRsp_t;
00094 
00095 typedef struct N_Zdp_MacCapability_t
00096 {
00097     uint8_t alternatePANCoordinator : 1;
00098     uint8_t deviceType : 1;
00099     uint8_t powerSource : 1;
00100     uint8_t rxOnWhenIdle : 1;
00101     uint8_t reserved : 2;
00102     uint8_t securityCapability : 1;
00103     uint8_t allocateAddress : 1;
00104 }  N_Zdp_MacCapability_t;
00105 
00106 typedef struct N_Zdp_NodeDescriptor_t
00107 {
00108     uint8_t logicalType : 3;
00109     uint8_t complexDescriptorAvailable: 1;
00110     uint8_t userDescriptorAvailable: 1;
00111     uint8_t reserved: 3;
00112     uint8_t apsFlags : 3;
00113     uint8_t frequencyBand : 5;
00114 } N_Zdp_NodeDescriptor_t;
00115 
00116 typedef struct N_Zdp_NodeDescRsp_t
00117 {
00118     uint8_t  sequenceNumber;
00119     N_Zdp_Status_t status;
00120     uint16_t nwkAddrOfInterest;
00121     N_Zdp_NodeDescriptor_t nodeDescriptor;
00122     N_Zdp_MacCapability_t macCapabilityFlags;
00123     uint16_t manufacturerCode;
00124     uint8_t maximumBufferSize;
00125     uint16_t maxmimumIncomingTransferSize;
00126     uint16_t serverMask;
00127     uint16_t maximumOutgoingTransferSize;
00128     uint8_t descriptorCapabilityField;
00129 } N_Zdp_NodeDescRsp_t;
00130 
00131 typedef struct N_Zdp_MatchDescRsp_t
00132 {

00134     N_Zdp_Status_t status;

00136     uint8_t matchLength;
00137     uint8_t *matchList;         
00138 } N_Zdp_MatchDescRsp_t;
00139 
00140 typedef struct N_Zdp_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t
00141 {
00142     uint8_t sequenceNumber;
00143     uint32_t channelMask;
00144     uint8_t scanDuration;
00145     union
00146     {
00147        struct EnergyScan_t
00148        {
00149             uint8_t scanCount;
00150        } energyScan;
00151        struct ChannelChange_t
00152        {
00153             uint8_t nwkUpdateId;
00154        } channelChange;
00155        struct ChannelMaskChange_t
00156        {
00157             uint8_t nwkUpdateId;
00158             uint16_t nwkManagerAddr;
00159        } channelMaskChange;
00160     } subCommand;
00161 } N_Zdp_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t;
00162 
00163 typedef struct N_Zdp_RoutingTableRecord_t
00164 {
00165     uint16_t destinationAddress;
00166     uint8_t status:3;
00167     uint8_t memoryConstraint:1;
00168     uint8_t manyToOne:1;
00169     uint8_t routeRecordRequired:1;
00170     uint8_t reserved:2;
00171     uint16_t nextHopAddress;
00172 } N_Zdp_RoutingTableRecord_t;
00173 
00174 typedef struct N_Zdp_MgmtRtgRsp_t
00175 {

00178     uint8_t routingTableEntries;
00179     uint8_t startIndex;
00180     uint8_t routingTableListCount;
00181     N_Zdp_RoutingTableRecord_t pRoutingTableList[1];
00182 } N_Zdp_MgmtRtgRsp_t;
00183

00194 typedef struct N_Zdp_NeighborTableRecord_t
00195 {
00196     N_Address_Extended_t extendedPanId;
00197     N_Address_Extended_t extendedAddress;
00198     uint16_t networkAddress;
00199     uint8_t deviceType:2;
00200     uint8_t rxOnWhenIdle:2;
00201     uint8_t relationship:3;
00202     uint8_t reserved1:1;
00203     uint8_t permitJoining:2;
00204     uint8_t reserved2:6;
00205     uint8_t depth;
00206     uint8_t lqi;
00207 } N_Zdp_NeighborTableRecord_t;
00208

00219 typedef struct N_Zdp_SimpleDescRsp_t
00220 {

00222     N_Zdp_Status_t    status;
00223     uint16_t          nwkAddrOfInterest;
00224     uint8_t           length;
00225     uint8_t           endpoint;
00226     uint16_t          appProfileId;
00227     uint16_t          appDeviceId;
00228     uint8_t           appDeviceVersion:4;
00229     uint8_t           reserved:4;
00230     uint8_t           appNumInClusters;
00231     uint16_t          pAppInClusterList[1];
00232 } N_Zdp_SimpleDescRsp_t;
00233

00246     uint8_t           *ActiveEPList; // variable length array, size is activeEPCount
00247 } N_Zdp_ActiveEndPointRsp_t;

00329 
00331     void (*ReceivedMgmtLeaveRsp)(N_Zdp_StatusRsp_t* pResponse);
00332 
00333     int8_t endOfList; // guard, must be initialized to -1
00334 } N_Zdp_ClientCallback_t;
